  suppressWarnings({
    library(dplyr)

ggplot(
  data = mtcars,
  aes(x = disp, y = mpg)
) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(
    title = "Sample Plot",
    subtitle = "Displacement (x) versus Miles Per Gallon (y)",
    x = NULL,
    y = NULL
  ) +
  theme_minimal()
